<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Orc Superstition](/Feats.aspx?ID=85) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 59 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
You attempt a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, before rolling.

</column>

---

You defend yourself against magic by relying on techniques derived from orc cultural superstitions. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your saving throw against the triggering spell or magical effect.

<title level="2">Orc Superstition leads to...</title>
[Pervasive Superstition](/Feats.aspx?ID=89)
name: Orc Superstition
